allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
v1.1.5: Fix department/site source and remove data limits

Major fixes for data loading and accuracy:

- Changed department/site to read from task fields (aubia_relatedprojectdepartment/site) instead of project fields
- Removed all $top query limits and implemented full pagination support
- Added filter to exclude cancelled tasks (taskstate ne 3)
- Now handles 7000+ users and thousands of tasks across 1000+ projects

This fixes issues where users were showing incorrect departments and not all resources were displaying.
